name: Push-Crate-Match 3D
description:
Push-crate-match is a colour matching game in 3D. Push crates of the same colour together, thereby clearing the levels of all crates.

Trijam #204: The 3 hour game jam
Theme: Blocked

WASD or Arrow keys to move - push matching boxes together to clear level

Crate model from a low poly asset pack - not sure
Kenny prototype kit
Sky - not sure
Music from pack I have
